# Celestia documentation

> Official documentation for Celestia, the modular data availability network for building scalable, sovereign rollups and applications.

These docs are built with Next.js + Nextra and exported statically. Links below point to the raw MDX sources in `main` so tools and LLMs can ingest clean text.

## Build: Post Retrieve Blob

- [Client / Go](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/celestiaorg/docs/main/app/build/post-retrieve-blob/client/go/page.mdx)
- [Client / Rust](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/celestiaorg/docs/main/app/build/post-retrieve-blob/client/rust/page.mdx)
- [Light Node / Advanced](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/celestiaorg/docs/main/app/build/post-retrieve-blob/light-node/advanced/page.mdx)
- [Light Node / Quickstart](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/celestiaorg/docs/main/app/build/post-retrieve-blob/light-node/quickstart/page.mdx)
- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/celestiaorg/docs/main/app/build/post-retrieve-blob/overview/page.mdx)

## Build: Private Blockspace

- [About](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/celestiaorg/docs/main/app/build/private-blockspace/about/page.mdx)
- [Quickstart](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/celestiaorg/docs/main/app/build/private-blockspace/quickstart/page.mdx)
